name: Bubble Man (DavidZen77)
description:
Oh no! Fire spirits are burning the forest down and ruining the environment! Animals and humans have nowhere to escape. There's only one hero that can stop this atrocity, BUBBLE MAN! Disarm the D.E.A.T.H. machine that's causing all the fire spirits to spawn in the forest. First you have to maneuver your way to the machine without getting caught by the enemy spirits.

For this project I created a game that incorporates flat design, gamification, and theatrification. I used p5.play, p5.clickable, p5.sound, p5.scenemanager, and p5.js. All the flat design art that was used was created by me through Adobe Illustrator. All sounds were not created by me.
